title: Claude Monet Water Lilies Pot Holder
description:
Pot Holder developed from Claude Monet’s Water Lilies, 1906 from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

This pot holder blends timeless style with modern practicality. If you’re so inspired, consider combining this with the Claude Monet Water Lilies Tea Towel and Apron, for a special gift set.

  • Dimensions: 8 in. x 8 in.  
  • Material: 100% cotton
  • Machine wash, line dry.
  • Blue trim
